name: Vermillion Kavat Armor
description: For the Kavat that turns up the heat on its quarry.

languages.description: Für die Kavat, die ihre Beute hetzt.
languages.name: Kavat-Rüstung: Vermillion

languages.description: Pour le Kavat qui met la pression sur ses proies.
languages.name: Armure de Kavat Vermillon

languages.description: Per il Kavat che vuole far salire la temperatura della sua preda.
languages.name: Armatura Kavat Vermillion

languages.description: 사냥감을 앞에 두고 뜨거워지는 카밧을 위한 아머입니다.
languages.name: 버밀리온 카밧 아머

languages.description: Para el kavat que sube la temperatura de su presa.
languages.name: Armadura Vermillion de kavat

languages.description: 给会对猎物提升火力的库娃。
languages.name: 朱红库娃护甲

languages.description: Для кавата, который любит охоту погорячее.
languages.name: Броня кавата: Вермиллион

languages.description: 真紅の熱意で獲物を狩る。
languages.name: Vermillion キャバットアーマー

languages.description: Dla Kavata, który podkręca temperaturę swoim ofiarom.
languages.name: Kavat: Pancerz Vermillion

languages.description: Para Kavats que levam o calor para a batalha contra suas presas.
languages.name: Armadura de Kavat: Vermillion

languages.description: 給那些對獵物火力全開的庫娃的護甲。
languages.name: 朱紅庫娃護甲

languages.description: สำหรับ Kavat ที่จะทำให้เหยื่อต้องร้อนเป็นไฟ
languages.name: เกราะ Vermillion Kavat

languages.description: Avı sırasında ortalığı karıştıran Kavat için.
languages.name: Vermillion Kavat Zırhı
